dict.acceptation: 稍微；有点；达到某种程度；
少量；某些数量；某种程度；

sent.orig: The such irritable scene, looks that lets the human somewhat be moved, also somewhat worried.
sent.trans: 这样火爆的场景，看着让人有几分感动，也有几分担心。

sent.orig: He is somewhat terrified, also somewhat unclear.
sent.trans: 他有些惶恐，也有些不明就里。

sent.orig: When I got the well-paid job in a foreign company, boyfriends were somewhat green with envy.
sent.trans: 当我在一家外企找了份收入丰厚的工作时，我的朋友都有点嫉妒我。

sent.orig: These effects can be very clearly delineated in animals, and somewhat in man.
sent.trans: 这些影响可以很明显的在动物身上，有时也在人的身上反映出来。

sent.orig: At Silver's polite salute he somewhat flushed.
sent.trans: 看到希尔弗在必恭必敬地向他行礼，他一下子气得满脸通红。
